Key: Maria, Marina! It can't end like this!

Hee hee. I had a feeling... you would say that,
Shido.

But I apologize. I must... disappear, along
with Marina.
No, there must be a way!

It is too late. It is impossible to reset the
Fraxinus' authority control and for Marina
to disappear alone.
Maria...

I am glad you came here, Shido. Now, I can
bid you farewell.
You're right. That might be a blessing.
Marina! Are you okay?

Shido Itsuka... You don't have time to waste,
right? What did you come here for?
I came to save you...

Shido, do not misunderstand. It is just that
we are not a priority for you.
Why would you say something like that...?
Shido, I have a request. Is that all right?
I don't want to hear it...
Come on, Shido. Please, let me say my piece.
...I understand.

Soon, the Fraxinus will fall upon the Earth.
In order to prevent this, we must disappear.

Shido, will you please erase Marina? Together,
with myself.
I didn't come here to do any of that...

Shido, I know you are kind. And that you do not
wish to make a decision that would sacrifice any
lives. But right now, have the courage to decide.

I can't... I can't do it! I can't abandon you
both!

Please, Shido. The days I spent in this world—
Tengu City—are very precious.

That is why you must stop the Fraxinus' descent.
I wish to protect the Tengu City I saw through
your eyes.
Maria...

Didn't you say you would save me? I think...
That moment is now.
Marina.

I am the Fraxinus AI. I am obviously interlinked
with the ship.

Please do not make murderers out of Marina
and me. Even if we were created to be weapons,
I wish to protect this world, to guide you.
But, even so!
Shido! Think, who are you protecting?!
Aaah... AAAAAAAAAAH!
This is... Damn it! I... I...!!

Aah, I see. So this is what it means to
disappear completely. It is much calmer
than how I thought it would feel.
Marina, I'm sorry... I...

Do not apologize. Hey, Shido Itsuka...
Was I wrong this whole time...?

You weren't wrong...
You were being straightforward.
You were being yourself.

Ahahaha... It's not fair that you're so kind.
Ah. There is one thing I wanted to tell you.
What?

When you pat my head... It brought me joy.
I thought to myself, this is what it feels like
to be shown affection by your family...
With this, it's over...
Marina...

(Marina looked the calmest I had ever seen
her as she faded away...)
Next is my turn...
In the end, I couldn't save either of you...

No, that is not true. You have done so much for
me. All the time we spent together... mattered.
Maria. In the end, I...
You kept your promise, Shido.
Pro...mise?
Yes. You taught me what love is.

Ahh, that's right. But ultimately, the
answer wasn't...
No, I found it. You gave it to me, Shido.
Huh?

What love is. I now understand why everyone
found it hard to answer. Putting it into words
is impossible. That's why, I'll leave with this.
Maria Arusu loves Shido Itsuka.
Maria...
Mm...

At the end of a date, couples partake in a
good-bye kiss. With this, I am done being
selfish.

Don't. Don't go. I'll take you anywhere!
As many dates as you want!

You're so lovely when you try your hardest,
even when you know it is impossible, Shido.

But I am happy to hear you say so, Shido.
You brought me joy until the very end.
Thank you, Shido. You are the kindest soul.

(She's disappearing. That sweet smile.
She's disappearing. Leaving behind a cruel
scar.)
Maria! MARIAAAAAAAAA!
